About

Hi, thanks for visiting my site! My name is Anthony Broccoli, I am a full-stack web developer and alumni of Syracuse University class of '14. I am passionate about coding and always excited to learn the latest and greatest technologies. In my spare time I am an avid mountain biker, home brewer, and amatuer photographer. Check out my projects below or take a look at my Github account. If you have any questions please reach out!
